welcome_message_body: Welcome to Marudi, Malaysia, a charming riverside town known for its vibrant local culture and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore our unique city and enjoy all it has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marudi Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Marudi Airport handles the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Lellang Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Long Lellang Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Miri Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carrier flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
